text: My 3rd child has been attending lessons here for the past year at N1 level. She’s a super stubborn child to handle, but the teachers have had nothing but kind words and loads of patience. I’ve also seen how my child has grown from refusing to talk, to being able to communicate properly without hesitation. Kudos to the teachers and school management for creating a lovely, God-centered, conducive learning environment!

Both my daughters  enjoy  going  to school every day. The school creates  an unforgettable learning  experience  for pre schoolers. My elder  daughter has very fond memories  of the teachers and learning  activities.  My daughters are inquisitive on new learning. This is really credit to the kindergarten as they make early learning  experiences  an enjoyable  and positive journey.

Both my girls attended Hebron Christian Preschool. All teachers are caring and professional. The school environment is clean and air-conditioned. We are very glad to have found this preschool in Yew Tee neighbourhood and knowing our girls are in safe hands and environment. They have enjoyed and learnt well during their time in the school.

A good preschool with good teachers.  It is a pity that my youngest son only attend 2 years in this school.  Thank you Mrs Michael and Mdm Dong  for your patience for my super active boy and thank you Mrs Tze for your good guidance to the teachers.  We will miss the school and God bless .
My kid enjoy attending the school and learning through the activities planned out by the school.
